Japanese:
<S0>あたまは ヘルメットじょうの
カバーで まもられている<*4>
English: <S0>Its head is protected by a helmet-like cover.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Its head is protected by a helmet-like cover.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>こまかい はで どんなもの
でも かみきってしまう<*4>
English: <S0>Can't help but gnaw through everything it comes across using its small teeth.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Can't help but gnaw through anything and everything it comes across using its small teeth.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>からだをまるめて てきからの
ダメージを かるくする<*4>
English: <S0>Rolls up in a ball to mitigate damage taken.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Rolls up in a ball to mitigate damage taken.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>からだの いろを かえて
すがたを かくすことができる<*4>
English: <S0>It can conceal itself by changing color.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It can conceal itself by changing color.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>なんでも きリさく かたい
ツメで こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>Attacks using tough claws that can cut through anything.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Attacks using tough claws that can cut through anything.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>おしリからでる ドクガスで
ジワジワとダメージをあたえる<*4>
English: <S0>With the poison gas emitted from its behind, it can cause damage bit by bit over time.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>With the poison gas emitted from its behind, it can cause damage bit by bit over time.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>すばやさで てきをほんろうし
ツノをつかって こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>Taunts opponents with its agility. Attacks using its horn.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Taunts opponents with its agility. Attacks using its horn.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>どうたいがチョウチンみたいに
のびちぢみする<*4>
English: <S0>Its body expands and compresses like an accordion.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Its body expands and compresses like an accordion.<*4>
Notes: Changed "paper lantern" to "accordion", as that sort of paper lantern isn't very popular in the West.

Japanese:
<S0>おなかの マークで いまの
キモチを あらわす<*4>
English: <S0>The mark on its stomach shows its current mood.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>The mark on its stomach shows its current mood.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ぷよぷよとした からだで
ダメージを はんげんする<*4>
English: <S0>Its jelly-like body reduces the damage it takes by half.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Its jelly-like body reduces the damage it takes by half.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>くらやみでもみえる めをもち
よるでも たたかえる<*4>
English: <S0>With eyes that see in the dark, it can fight even at night.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>With eyes that see in the dark, it can fight even at night.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>クチバシから きょうリょくな
こうげきを くリだす<*4>
English: <S0>Unleashes powerful attacks with its beak.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Unleashes powerful attacks with its beak.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>とてもするどい ツメとキバで 
きリさきこうげきをする<*4>
English: <S0>Shreds its foes with razor-sharp claws and fangs.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Shreds its foes with razor-sharp claws and fangs.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>せなかに たくさんのタマゴが
あるが なかには なにが?<*4>
English: <S0>It carries eggs on its back, but what lies inside them?<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It carries eggs on its back, but what lies inside them?<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>あしのうらの きゅうばんで
どんなところも いどうできる<*4>
English: <S0>The suction cups on its feet allow it to traverse any terrain.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>The suction cups on its feet allow it to traverse any terrain.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>うつぶせの じょうたいで
すんでいることが おおい<*4>
English: <S0>Commonly lives lying face-down.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Commonly lives lying face-down.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>フサフサした たいもうのした
には てあしがかくれている<*4>
English: <S0>Its legs are hidden under its bushy fur.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Its legs are hidden under its bushy fur.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>おどろくと カイガラのなかに
みを かくしてしまう<*4>
English: <S0>When startled, it hides within its shell.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>When startled, it hides within its shell.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>リょうてのハサミと シッポの
ドクバリで こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>Attacks using its pincers and the stinger on its tail.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Attacks using its pincers and the stinger on its tail.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>せなかにある かおのもようで
てきを まどわせる<*4>
English: <S0>Confuses adversaries using the face-like pattern on its back.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Confuses adversaries using the face-like pattern on its back.<*4>

Japanese: colspan=2 | '''Civilized Denjuu                                   '''

<S0>ハネで かぜを おこして
するどいツメで こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>Stirs up wind using its wings, and then attacks with its sharp claws.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Stirs up wind using its wings, and then attacks with its sharp claws.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>おおきなこぶしから くリだす
パンチはデンジュウカイいち!<*4>
English: <S0>The punches it delivers with its enormous fists are unmatched in the Denjuu World!<*4>
Draft version: <S0>The punches it delivers with its enormous fists are unmatched in the Denjuu World!<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>うみの あさせに なかまと
むれをつくって せいそくする<*4>
English: <S0>Gathered in packs, it lives together in sea shoals.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Gathered in packs, it lives together in sea shoals.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ボウシが トレードマーク
カオと オシリが ハートがた<*4>
English: <S0>Its hat is its trademark. Its face and its butt are both heart-shaped.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Its hat is its trademark. Its face and its butt are both heart-shaped.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>リょうかたのヒレを ひっしに
はばたかせて ちゅうにうく<*4>
English: <S0>Hovers by frantically flapping its shoulder fins.<*4>
Draft version:
<S0>Hovers by frantically flapping its
shoulder fins.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>おしリのとっきからドクバリを
とばして こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>Shoots poison needles from the protrusion on its abdomen.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Shoots poison needles from the protrusion on its abdomen.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>やこうせいのため ひるまは
かくれていることが おおい<*4>
English: <S0>Being a nocturnal creature, it often hides during the day.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Being a nocturnal creature, it often hides during the day.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>すいちゅうに すんでいるが
そらを とぶことも できる<*4>
English: <S0>Although it lives underwater, it is also capable of flight.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Although it lives underwater, it is also capable of flight.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>からだじたいを かいてんさせ
たつまきを おこせる<*4>
English: <S0>By gyrating its own body, it can create whirlwinds.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>By gyrating its own body, it can create whirlwinds.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>リっぱなあしと おなかにある
なぞのポケットが とくちょう<*4>
English: <S0>Its most distinguishing features are its capable legs and the mysterious pouch on its stomach.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Its most distinguishing features are its capable legs and the mysterious pouch on its stomach.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ながくひらベったい シッポを
まるめて こうげきしてくる<*4>
English:
<S0>Curls up its long,
flat tail and uses it to attack.<*4>
Draft version:
<S0>Curls up its long,
flat tail and uses it to attack.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>2ほんあしで たっているが
すばやく はしることができる<*4>
English: <S0>Despite standing on two legs, it can run at great speeds.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Despite standing on two legs, it can run at great speeds.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>かんせつがない ながいうでを
ふリまわして なぐリかかる <*4>
English: <S0>Throws punches by swinging its long, jointless arms.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Throws punches by swinging its long, jointless arms.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ちょうおんぱのような こえで 
てきを こんらんさせてしまう<*4>
English: <S0>Disorients its foes with an almost ultrasonic voice.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Disorients its foes with an almost ultrasonic voice.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>せなかにある おおきなツメを
のばして とっしんこうげき<*4>
English: <S0>Extends the large claws on its back and charges at its foes.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Extends the large claws on its back and charges at its foes.<*4>

Japanese: colspan=2 | '''Techno Denjuu                                      '''

<S0>ほのおのつばさで ひこうして
てきの ようすを うかがう<*4>
English: <S0>Using its fiery wings, it takes to the skies. From up high, it surveys its enemies at a distance.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Using its fiery wings, it takes to the skies. From up high, it surveys its enemies at a distance.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>てきを こんらん させてから
あたまのツノで こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>After disorienting the opponent, it attacks using its horn.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>After disorienting the opponent, it attacks using its horn.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>トレードマークの おおきな
ドリルで とっしんこうげき<*4>
English: <S0>Charges at opponents with its trademark drill.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Charges at opponents with its trademark drill.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>からだじゅうの とっきから
てっきゅうを うちだす<*4>
English: <S0>Shoots iron balls from the bumps all over its body.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Shoots iron balls from the bumps all over its body.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>あたまの カラの なかには
ランチャーが かくされている<*4>
English: <S0>A rocket launcher is hidden under the shell on its head.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>A rocket launcher is hidden under the shell on its head.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>かいてんして くうきのわを
つくリだし こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>It spins to create rings of air, which it then uses to attack.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It spins to create rings of air, which it then uses to attack.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>せなかには きょうリょくな
じゅうを そうびしている<*4>
English: <S0>It's equipped with a powerful gun on its back.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It's equipped with a powerful gun on its back.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>かおはまさしく カバそのもの
おおきなキバでてきにかみつく<*4>
English: <S0>While it undoubtedly has the face of a hippo, it also has prominent tusks to sink into opponents.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>While it undoubtedly has the face of a hippo, it also has prominent tusks to sink into opponents.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>あたまについているカッターの
はを かいてんさせて とぶ<*4>
English: <S0>It revolves the blades attached to its head in order to fly.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It revolves the blades attached to its head in order to fly.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>せなかに たくさんついている 
バクダンを むしってなげる<*4>
English: <S0>Can pick and throw the countless bombs it carries on its back.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Can pick and throw the countless bombs it carries on its back.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ぶあついヒズメで どんなもの
でもふみつけてペシャンコに!<*4>
English: <S0>By trampling things with its massive hooves, it is able to turn most everything to an unidentifiable paste.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>By trampling things with its massive hooves, it is able to turn most everything to an unidentifiable paste.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>からだじゅうにある トゲを
てきにとばして しびれさせる<*4>
English: <S0>Paralyzes opponents by launching the spikes that cover its body.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Paralyzes opponents by launching the spikes that cover its body.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ちょうろうのひとリ コウラ
には ぶきがつまっている<*4>
English: <S0>One of the elders. Its shell is covered with weapons.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>フサフサの けのなかには
ミサイルを かくしもっている<*4>
English: <S0>Conceals missiles under its shaggy hair.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>くうちゅうから ツメや
マシンガンで こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>Attacks from above using its claws and its machine gun.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ワキから むすうのアシがでて
ムカデのように はしれる<*4>
English: <S0>Countless legs sprout from its sides. It runs like a centipede.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Countless legs sprout from its sides. It runs like a centipede.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>さかだちじょうたいで ツノと
シッポを つかって こうげき<*4>
English: <S0>Standing on its hands, it uses both its horn and its tail to attack.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Standing on its hands, it uses both its horn and its tail to attack.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>きょうリょくな ほのおけいの
こうげきを とくいとする<*4>
English: <S0>Powerful flame attacks are its specialty.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Powerful flame attacks are its specialty.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>そとからはみえないが かたに
ボンベが ないぞうされている<*4>
English: <S0>Although you can't tell from outside, its shoulders have gas cylinders built in.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Although you can't tell from outside, its shoulders have gas cylinders built in.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>おおきなツノで てきをはさみ 
せなかのビームでこうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>Grabs foes with its oversized pincers and attacks by firing the beam cannon mounted on its back.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Grabs foes with its oversized pincers and attacks by firing the beam cannon mounted on its back.<*4>

Japanese: colspan=2 | '''Big Denjuu                                      '''

<S0>ヘルメットにからだをすっぽリ
いれて ダメージをかるくする<*4>
English: <S0>Mitigates damage by taking shelter within its helmet.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Mitigates damage by taking shelter within its helmet.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>おこるとヒレをたて いかくし
てきをひるませ こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>When angered, its fins fan out to intimidate the foe. It attacks while they're startled.<*4>
Draft version:
<S0>When angered, its fins fan out to intimidate the foe.
It attacks while they're startled by its size.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>まるまって トゲのボールに
すがたをかえて とっしんする<*4>
English: <S0>Curls up in a spiky ball and careens toward its opponent.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Curls up in a spiky ball and careens toward the opponent.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>からだが あなだらけなので
しっぽからふくとフエになる?<*4>
English: <S0>Covered in holes. Would blowing on its tail make it a flute?<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Covered in holes. Would blowing on its tail make it a flute?<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>かたのパーツで ぼうぎょして
するどいツメで こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>Its shoulder plating protects it while it attacks with its sharp claws.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Its shoulder plating protects it while it attacks with its sharp claws.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>だっぴちゅうのようだが...
ぬいだらどうなるの?<*4>
English: <S0>It seems to be in the middle of shedding. What do you think it'll look like when it's finished?<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It seems to be in the middle of shedding. What do you think it'll look like when it's finished?<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>からだのあちこちが するどい
はもののようになっている<*4>
English: <S0>Sharp, blade-like growths stick out all over its body.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Sharp, blade-like growths stick out all over its body.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ジャンプ ひとつで すごい
じしんを おこすことができる<*4>
English: <S0>It can cause massive earthquakes simply by jumping.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It can cause massive earthquakes simply by jumping.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>しょくしゅの さきの トゲを
つかい デンキこうげきをする<*4>
English: <S0>Unleashes electric attacks through the conductive spikes on the ends of its tentacles.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Unleashes electric attacks through the conductive spikes on the ends of its tentacles.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ほうまんなボディーをつかって
きょうリょくな タックル<*4>
English: <S0>Delivers powerful tackles with its corpulent body.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Delivers powerful tackles with its corpulent body.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>すばやいうごきで すがたを
みうしなわせ こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>With swift movements, it makes opponents lose sight of it. It strikes while they're still confused.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>With swift movements, it makes opponents lose sight of it. It strikes while they're still confused.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>なんと からだの うしろから 
ほのおが ふきだしている<*4>
English: <S0>What in the world? There are flames spouting from its back!<*4>
Draft version: <S0>What in the world? There are flames spouting from its back!<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>えものを とらえるように
すばやいうごきで おいこむ<*4>
English: <S0>It moves quickly and corners its prey in order to catch it.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It moves quickly and corners its prey in order to catch it.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>タマゴのなかには いったい 
なにが はいっているのかな?<*4>
English: <S0>Just what could be inside that egg?<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Just what could be inside that egg?<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>おおごえで さけび ひるんだ
ところで なぐリかかってくる<*4>
English: <S0>Lets out loud yells, and strikes while the opponent is reeling from the shock.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Lets out loud yells, and strikes while the opponent is reeling from the shock.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>うつぶせになって てきに
きづかれずに せっきんする<*4>
English: <S0>Lies face-down and edges unnoticed toward its enemy.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Lies face-down and edges unnoticed toward its enemy.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ひらひらしたマントの したの
ボディは ひ.み.つ!<*4>
English:
<S0>There is indeed a body hidden under the fluttering cape...
But what it looks like is a secret!<*4>
Draft version:
<S0>There is indeed a body hidden under the fluttering cape...
But what it looks like is a secret!<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ひらいているカラを とじると
ぼうぎょけいたいになる<*4>
English: <S0>Goes into defense mode by closing its shell.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Goes into defense mode by closing its shell.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ふたまたにわかれた シッポと 
おおきなハサミが とくちょう<*4>
English: <S0>Its two-pronged tail and large pincers are its strong points.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Its two-pronged tail and large pincers are its strong points.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ひだリのツメで つかまえて
みぎのサーベルで こうげき<*4>
English: <S0>Its left hand is a claw it uses to grab opponents, and its right is a sabre it then attacks them with.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Its left hand is a claw it uses to grab opponents, and its right is a sabre it then attacks them with.<*4>

Japanese: colspan=2 | '''Burst Denjuu                                      '''

<S0>うでの するどいブレードで
どんなものでも きリさく<*4>
English: <S0>Using the sharp blades on its arms, it can cut through anything.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Using the sharp blades on its arms, it can cut through anything.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>うでの とがったハンマーで
てきを ふんさいする<*4>
English: <S0>Pulverizes opponents using the pointed hammers on its arms.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Pulverizes opponents using the pointed hammers on its arms.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>れいきを ふきかけて てきの
ぼうぎょリょくを よわめる<*4>
English: <S0>Weakens its opponent's defenses by blowing ice-cold air at them.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Weakens its opponent's defenses by blowing ice-cold air at them.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>こもリうたを うたい てきを
ねむらせて こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>Puts foes to sleep by singing lullabies. While they're asleep, it can attack unhindered.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Puts foes to sleep by singing lullabies. While they're asleep, it can attack unhindered.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>せなかにドクロのマークがあリ
シッポをならして いかくする<*4>
English: <S0>A skull-like pattern can be found on its back. It intimidates opponents by rattling its tail.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>A skull-like pattern can be found on its back. It intimidates opponents by rattling its tail.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>とっきぶつから れいきゃく
ガスをだして こごえさせる<*4>
English: <S0>Shoots cooling gas from the protrusion on its abdomen, freezing everything it hits.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Shoots cooling gas from the protrusion on its abdomen, freezing everything it hits.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ツメをつかってちょうおんぱを
はっせいさせることができる<*4>
English: <S0>It is able to generate ultrasonic waves by swiping its claws.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It is able to generate ultrasonic waves by swiping its claws.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>からだのなかにデンキをためて
いっきに ほうしゅつする<*4>
English: <S0>Builds up electricity within its body and releases it in one go.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Builds up electricity within its body and releases it in one go.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>かぜが まるでリボンのように 
からだを つつみこんでいる<*4>
English: <S0>Ribbon-like winds envelop its body.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Ribbon-like winds envelop its body.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>じょうぶな リょうあしで
すばやく うごくことができる<*4>
English: <S0>Its sturdy legs allow it to move fairly quickly.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Its sturdy legs allow it to move fairly quickly.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>とてもかたいトゲつきシッポを
ふリまわして こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>Attacks by swinging its thorny tail like a club.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Attacks by swinging its thorny tail like a club.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>あたまがおもいので しっぽで
バランスを たもっている<*4>
English: <S0>Since its head is so heavy, it balances using its tail.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Since its head is so heavy, it balances using its tail.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>おこらせると ながいうでを
ふリまわしてとっしんしてくる<*4>
English: <S0>When angered, it starts swinging its long arms about and charges wildly at its opponent.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>When angered, it starts swinging its long arms about and charges wildly at its opponent.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ふうせんのように おおきく
ふくらみ どくガスこうげき<*4>
English: <S0>To attack, it first puffs up like a balloon, and then blows poison gas at foes.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>To attack, it first puffs up like a balloon, and then blows poison gas at foes.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>せなかにある 6つのツメを
まえにのばし こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>Extends the six large claws on its back before attacking.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Extends the six large claws on its back before attacking.<*4>

Japanese: colspan=2 | '''Explosion Denjuu                                      '''

<S0>てのようにもみえる 2ほんの
シッポをつかってこうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>Its tails look like hands. It uses both tails to attack.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Its tails look like hands. It uses both tails to attack.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>とおくのてきでも ハンマーを
とばして いちげきふんさい!<*4>
English: <S0>It can throw its hammers great distances. Not even faraway foes are safe from pulverization!<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It can throw its hammers great distances. Not even faraway foes are safe from pulverization!<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>スクリューじょうの シッポで
すいちゅうを じゆうにうごく<*4>
English: <S0>It moves freely underwater using its propeller-shaped tail.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It moves freely underwater using its propeller-shaped tail.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>みみのさきを まえにたおして
バルカンを うちまくる<*4>
English: <S0>The tips of its ears turn forward and fire like gatling guns.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>The tips of its ears turn forward and fire like gatling guns.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ちかくのてきは しょくしゅで
とおくのてきは ドクガスで<*4>
English: <S0>Nearby enemies meet its tentacles, while those far away get to feel the effects of its poison gas cannon.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Nearby enemies meet its tentacles, while those far away get to feel the effects of its poison gas cannon.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>おしリの かいてんカッターで
すベてを せつだんしてしまう<*4>
English: <S0>Everything in its path gets torn up by the fearsome revolving blades in its abdomen.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Everything in its path gets torn up by the fearsome revolving blades in its abdomen.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>あたまの ミサイルと うでの
ニードルで こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>To attack, it uses both the missile launcher on its head and the spear-like needles on its arms.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>To attack, it uses both the missile launcher on its head and the spear-like needles on its arms.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>たいないに ためた デンキを
ビームに ヘんかんする<*4>
English: <S0>It stores electricity, concentrates it, and fires it as a beam.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It stores electricity, concentrates it, and fires it as a beam.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>かはんしんが ドリルのように
かいてんして そらを とぶ<*4>
English: <S0>It flies by rotating its lower body like a drill.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It flies by rotating its lower body like a drill.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>あたまを まえに たおすと
バズーカに はやがわリ<*4>
English: <S0>Quickly turns into a bazooka by pointing its head forward.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Quickly turns into a bazooka by pointing its head forward.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ちょうろうのひとリ こぶが
ひらくと おそろしいものが!<*4>
English: <S0>One of the elders. Within its hump lies something terrifying!<*4>
Draft version: <S0>One of the elders. Within its hump lies something terrifying!<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>サナエバに せいたいじっけん
され こんなすがたになった<*4>
English: <S0>Its strange appearance is a result of experiments carried out by Sanaeba.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Its strange appearance is a result of experiments carried out by Sanaeba.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ぜんぽうの おおきなあなから
すごいビームを はなつ<*4>
English: <S0>It fires a massive beam from the large hole on its front.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It fires a massive beam from the large hole on its front.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>からだじゅうの あちこちに
いくつもぶきがかくされている<*4>
English: <S0>A myriad of weapons are hidden everywhere on its body.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>A myriad of weapons are hidden everywhere on its body.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>からだじゅうから おとをだす
おんがくずきの ようきなヤツ<*4>
English:
<S0>Sounds can be heard from all over its body.
This cheerful Denjuu loves music.<*4>
Draft version:
<S0>Sounds can be heard from all over its body.
This cheerful Denjuu loves music.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ヨロイのように とてもかたい
からだで とつげきしてくる<*4>
English: <S0>Charges at opponents with its tough, armor-like body.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Charges at opponents with its tough, armor-like body.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>さゆうの たてのようなもので
こうげきを ガードする<*4>
English: <S0>It guards against attacks using the shield-like plates on its sides.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It guards against attacks using the shield-like plates on its sides.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ちょうろうのひとリ ネコがた
サイボーグ デンジュウ<*4>
English: <S0>One of the elders. A cyborg Denjuu in the form of a cat.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>One of the elders. A cyborg Denjuu in the form of a cat.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>からだじたいが Dショット!
あしがないので てであるく<*4>
English: <S0>Its very body is a D-Shot! It has no legs, so it walks using its hands.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Its very body is a D-Shot! It has no legs, so it walks using its hands.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>てのひらに そうびしている
マシンガンで てきをうちぬく<*4>
English: <S0>Riddles foes with bullets from the machine guns in its palms.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Riddles foes with bullets from the machine guns it has installed in its palms.<*4>

Japanese: colspan=2 | '''Super-Machine Denjuu                                      '''

<S0>どんなに すばやくても この
スピードキングにはかなわない<*4>
English: <S0>However fast they may be, no one comes close to beating this king of speed.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>However fast they may be, no one comes close to beating this king of speed.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ムネにある マシンガンを
うちだして こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>Extends the machine gun embedded in its chest to attack.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Extends the machine gun embedded in its chest to attack.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>かたにそうびしたランチャーを
まえにたおして しゃげきする<*4>
English: <S0>It directs its shoulder cannons forward to fire them at its foes.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It directs its shoulder cannons forward to fire them at its foes.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>かたいウロコで ガードして
うでのマシンガンで こうげき<*4>
English: <S0>Defends using its hard scales, and attacks using the machine gun built into its arm.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Defends using its hard scales, and attacks using the machine gun built into its arm.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>たくさんある しょくしゅは
ふだんは たばねている<*4>
English: <S0>It usually keeps its many tentacles bundled up neatly.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It usually keeps its many tentacles bundled up neatly.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>するどいキバと シッポからの
カエンホウシャはきょうリょく<*4>
English: <S0>Main powers: sharp fangs and a flamethrower for a tail.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Main powers: sharp fangs and a flamethrower for a tail.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>かたいからだをもち シッポ
から ミサイルをうちだす<*4>
English: <S0>It can take a beating. Shoots missiles from its tail.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It can take a beating. Shoots missiles from its tail.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>シッポに かくしもっている
ミサイルをはなからはっしゃ!<*4>
English: <S0>Missiles are concealed under its tail. It fires them using its trunk.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Missiles are concealed under its tail. It fires them using its trunk.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>からだが ジェットエンジン!
しかしまっすぐしかすすめない<*4>
English: <S0>Its body is a jet engine! It can only go straight ahead.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Its body is a jet engine! It can only go straight ahead.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>とおくのてきをモリでひきよせ
ドリルで こうげきする<*4>
English: <S0>Pulls opponents close with its harpoon stinger and attacks using its claw drills.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Pulls opponents close with its harpoon stinger and attacks using its claw drills.<*4>

Japanese: colspan=2 | '''Super Denjuu                                      '''

<S0>とてもながくバネのあるあしで
とっしんこうげきをする<*4>
English: <S0>Charges swiftly from afar on its springy legs.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Charges swiftly from afar on its springy legs.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>あたまにツノをもち からだに
たくさんの トゲがある<*4>
English: <S0>It has a horn on its head, and numerous spikes cover its body.<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It has a horn on its head, and numerous spikes cover its body.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ハネのようなものが せなかに
あるが はたしてとベるのか?<*4>
English: <S0>It has wing-like plates on its back, but can it use them to fly?<*4>
Draft version: <S0>It has wing-like plates on its back, but can it use them to fly?<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>おおきなツバサを はばたかせ 
こうそくで そらをとぶ<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Swiftly takes to the skies with a flap of its large wings.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>しょくしゅを ばたつかせると
すこしなら とベるらしい?<*4>
Draft version: <S0>If it flaps its wings, it might be able to fly just a little bit...?<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>ナイフのような するどい
シッポとツメで こうげきする<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Attacks using its sharp, knife-like tail and claws.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>くびの カバーを ひらいて
ダメージを かるくする<*4>
Draft version: <S0>By fanning out the shell on its neck, it defends against incoming damage.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>おおきくて リっぱなあしで
てきを ふみつぶしてしまう<*4>
Draft version: <S0>Tramples all over its foes with its large, imposing feet.<*4>

Japanese:
<S0>まきついている ほうたいで
トモダチを ちリょうする<*4>

<S0>おおきなハサミにつかまったら
もう にげることはできない<*4>

<S0>うでのカバーからしゅリけんを
なげて こうげきしてくる<*4>

<S0>じょうぶな まえばが ぶき
ばつぐんのキックリょくをもつ<*4>

<S0>ツノをしんどうさせて どんな
ものでも きリきざんでしまう<*4>

<S0>しゅうだんで おそいかかる
しゅうせいがある<*4>

<S0>ナイフのような ハネで
カマイタチを おこせる<*4>
colspan=2 | '''Demon Denjuu                                      '''

<S0>あたまからのびた ぶあつい
せびれを 4つもっている<*4>

<S0>ヨロイのような きんにくで
てきの こうげきをガードする<*4>

<S0>ぜったいれいどの ふぶきを
はきだし てきを よわらせる<*4>

<S0>するどい ツメと ツノで
てきを こうげきする<*4>

<S0>ヒダの うちがわから ドクの
ほうしをとばして よわらせる<*4>

<S0>おしリにある もうひとつの
おおきなくちで かみつく<*4>

<S0>からだじゅうに トゲトゲした 
とっきぶつを もっている<*4>

<S0>みためは かわいいが はなつ
デンキは とてもきょうリょく<*4>

<S0>ツメは ムチのように のびて
とおくのてきにも こうかあリ<*4>

<S0>ざんぞうを のこすほどの 
スピードで てきをかくらん<*4>

<S0>いつでも どんなときでも
かならず おこっている<*4>

<S0>ふだんは おおきないわやまに
ばけて せいそくしている<*4>

<S0>からだはちいさいが すごい
ジャンプリょくとパワーをもつ<*4>

<S0>ちょうろうのひとリ ストロー
バリをだして てきのちをすう<*4>

<S0>からだのおおきさや かたちを
じゆうに かえることができる<*4>
colspan=2 | '''Dark Void Denjuu                                      '''

<S0>せんとうきのようにそらをとび
ハイパーミサイルを うちだす<*4>

<S0>あたまとうでにそうびしている
ミサイルは きょうリょく<*4>

<S0>あしがキャタピラになっていて
どんなちけいも なんのその<*4>

<S0>じょうはんしん かはんしんが
ぶんリして ういている<*4>

<S0>たいきの ちからを とリこみ
パワーのもとに している<*4>
colspan=2 | '''True Denjuu                                      '''

<S0>きょうじんな うしろアシで
とつげきしてくる<*4>

<S0>3ぼんのきょうリょくなツノで
なんでんも くしざしにする<*4>

<S0>せなかに かくれているハネを
ひらけば そらもとベる<*4>

<S0>マントのように まとっている
ツバサをひろげて ぞらをとぶ<*4>

<S0>はばたき とぶ そのすがたは
まさに かみを おもわせる<*4>
colspan=2 | '''God Denjuu                                      '''

<S0>せなかに くちがあリ せびれ
のようなキバで かみくだく<*4>

<S0>からだじゅうに トゲがあリ
ふれるものすベてにダメージ<*4>

<S0>みずを じざいに あやつる
ふしぎな デンジュウ<*4>

<S0>ながい てをつかい もリの
なかを じざいにうごきまわる<*4>

<S0>いつでも なにがあっても
ぜったい おこっている<*4>

<S0>しんしゅくじざいのブレードで
てきを きリさいてしまう<*4>

<S0>ほのおの たてがみを もち
はいになるまで やきつくす<*4>

<S0>ツバサを ひろげ そらから
するどいツメで こうげきする<*4>

<S0>たくさんの かくれた くちを
もっている とてもきょうぼう<*4>
colspan=2 | '''Devil Denjuu                                      '''

<S0>せなかに きょだいな ぶきの
はっしゃこうをそうびしている<*4>

<S0>こうげきリょくぼうぎょリょく
ともに のうリょくがたかい<*4>

<S0>カクヘイキなみの とても
きょうリょくな そうびをもつ<*4>
colspan=2 | '''Dendel and Teletel                                      '''

<S0>あれー みつかっちゃったー?
どうしてだろ? おかしーなー<*4>

<S0>おやー みつかってしもーたわ
どないしよー かなわんなー<*4>
colspan=2 | '''Other                                        '''

<S0>デンジュウのせつめいが
はいリます。<*4>
